teams.name: Tech Team
teams.description: The Tech Team is responsible for all the technical aspects of the project, including development, deployment, and maintenance of the app.

teams.name: Creative Team
teams.description: The Creative Team focuses on designing the user interface and user experience, ensuring the project is visually appealing and user-friendly.

teams.name: OQPR Team
teams.description: The OQPR Team handles operations, quality assurance, and process reviews to ensure the product is efficient and meets all standards.

teams.name: Design Team
teams.description: The Design Team is in charge of branding, marketing materials, and creating the visual identity of the company.
